title: Lucky for Him
description: Austin Sanders, professional baseball player and son of awealthy businessman, has had his good fortune handed to him like a lucky penny.When his shoulder injury throws him out of the lineup for the Kansas CityRoyals, Austin is faced with starting his life over at thirty-one.As Austin tries to redefine his life, he meetsbeautiful and inquisitive marketing executive Ryan Taylor. Ryan finds herselfdrawn to Austin . . . but she's also drawn to his secrets. When Ryan lets hercuriosity gets the best of her, she begins investigating Austin's almostunnatural source of luck. She had no idea that the answer would lead her to beentwined in a murderous plot, ancient magic, and maybe the love of alifetime.
author: Tinley Innes
